  • Classes in nom.tam.util used by nom.tam.fits 
    Class Description
    ArrayDataInput
    Interface for reading array data from inputs.
    ArrayDataOutput
    Interface for writing array data to outputs.
    ByteArrayIO
    A class for reading and writing into byte arrays with a stream-like interface.
    ColumnTable
    A data table is conventionally considered to consist of rows and columns, where the structure within each column is constant, but different columns may have different structures.
    ComplexValue
    A no-frills complex value, for representing complex numbers in FITS headers.
    Cursor
    This interface extends the Iterator interface to allow insertion of data and move to previous entries in a collection.
    CursorValue  
    FitsFile
    This class is intended for high performance reading and writing FITS files or block of FITS-formatted data.
    FitsOutputStream
    This class is intended for high performance writing FITS files or FITS data blocks.
    RandomAccess
    These packages define the methods which indicate that an i/o stream may be accessed in arbitrary order.
    TableException

    This interface defines the properties that a generic table should have.

    Class for decoding FITS-formatted binary data into Java arrays.
    FitsEncoder
    Class for encoding select Java arrays into FITS binary format.

    This class is intended for high performance reading FITS files or blocks of FITS data.
    FitsIO
    super closable interface for all fits reader/writers.

    This class is intended for high performance writing FITS files or FITS data blocks.
    FlexFormat
    Formatting number values for use in FITS headers.
    FormatException  
    InputDecoder
    Efficient base class for decoding of binary input into Java arrays.
    InputDecoder.InputBuffer
    The conversion buffer for decoding binary data representation into Java arrays (objects).
    InputReader
    Basic binary input reading functionality.
    OutputEncoder
    Efficient base class for encoding Java arrays into binary output.
    OutputEncoder.OutputBuffer
    The conversion buffer for encoding Java arrays (objects) into a binary data representation.
    OutputWriter
    Basic binary output writing functionality.
